name: electrical-supplier-website
description: Full-stack B2B electrical supplier website (Express + Prisma + React + Vite)
author: MD EAFTEKHIRUL ISLAM

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:5000: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run dev
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.format: npm --prefix backend run format && npm --prefix frontend run format
scripts.test:e2e: npm --prefix backend run admin:ensure-roles && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm --prefix backend run admin:ensure-roles && playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm --prefix backend run admin:ensure-roles && playwright test --headed
